entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_1_1: A good friend of mine has gotten lost outside of town and needs to find a way to get back to me.  Can you help?
entries.npc_2_1: Good.  I'll let you in on a little secret...this person's not exactly a friend, but don't worry; you'll get paid for your work.
entries.npc_3_1: Oh.  Well, fine then.  Be that way.
entries.player_1_1: Yeah, I can do it.  I'll need some form of payment though.
entries.npc_reward_1: Careful with this thing.  It's well put together, but if you crush it it won't be worth as much.
entries.npc_1_2: One of my relatives is trying to get to me so that we can go to a reception together, but has managed to get lost outside of town.  Can you help out?
entries.npc_2_2: Hurry please, I don't want the party to start without us!
entries.npc_3_2: You have no idea how much damage I could do to your life.  But be gone, and if you're lucky I'll forget you.
entries.player_2_2: No way.   I couldn't care less about this.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here's your official proclamation.  It won't be valid unless I get elected, but hang onto it just in case.
entries.npc_1_3: My friend got lost trying to find his way home.  I think there may have been some Corellian wine involved, you know?  Can you help my friend make it back to me here?
entries.npc_2_3: Good.  When you get back we'll work out some payment arrangements.
entries.npc_3_3: I should have taken the advice of the jawas.  They told me not to trust people like you.
entries.player_2_3: I thought rich people had servants to do their work.
entries.npc_reward_3: Here you go.  This is a picture I took taking off from an undiscovered planet.  That picture is one of a kind.
entries.player_1_4: Sounds crazy but I'll do it.
entries.npc_1_4: Sibling rivalry has led to a very severe game of hide and seek, unfortunately one of the players is still hiding and doesn't realize the game is over.  I need someone to find them and bring them back here to me.
entries.npc_2_4: Very nice of you, I must say.  I thought you looked a little, um...dangerous, but I can see you're as trustworthy as the day is long.
entries.npc_3_4: Just like my servants.  No help at all.  Good day.
entries.npc_reward_4: Here's a recording rod that I paid way too much for.  It's valuable but fragile.  Be careful with it.
entries.npc_4_1: Well, this and that.  There's not much to tell really.  You know.
entries.npc_4_2: It's my uncle's fiftieth birthday, or my aunt's fortieth birthday, or my grandparent's wedding anniversary...or...no, I can't remember.
entries.npc_4_3: Only when we're celebrating.  Which is pretty much every day I guess...
entries.npc_4_4: Well, when you're rich you can pretty much do what you want.
entries.player_3_1: What does this friend of yours do?
entries.player_3_4: You guys just play hide and seek out in the desert?
entries.dontknowyou: I'm sorry but I don't recognize you and I'm not going to follow you anywhere.
entries.otherescort: I think you're here to pick up someone else.  You're certainly not taking ME anywhere.
entries.escortother: I think you're looking for someone else.
entries.npc_takeme_1: I hope you're here to get me back to my friend.
entries.npc_takeme_2: Great!  Let's go, I don't want to miss that reception!
entries.npc_takeme_3: Somebody told you I was drunk?  Liars.  I don't drink.  Now let's get back before I get thirsty.
entries.npc_takeme_4: Thank you.  I thought I was going to be stuck out here all day.  Let's get going.
